features.title: Tile Map Rendering
features.description: Render a 32px grid world with visible tiles and entity sprites using PixiJS 8, driven by simulation state rather than ad-hoc UI state.
acceptanceHints: Grid aligns to 32px tiles with deterministic tile-to-pixel mapping.
Entities render at correct tile coordinates and facing direction.
Renderer consumes state snapshots from the fixed-step simulation loop.

features.title: Mining Loop
features.description: Allow Miner entities to extract iron-ore from Resource nodes and emit ore toward their facing direction at deterministic tick intervals.
acceptanceHints: Miner only extracts from valid iron-ore resource placement rules.
Output item type is always iron-ore.
Extraction cadence is measured in simulation ticks, independent of render FPS.

features.title: Belt Transport
features.description: Move items across directional belts (N/E/S/W) one step at a time under fixed-tick simulation rules.
acceptanceHints: Belts accept items from valid upstream outputs when capacity allows.
Items progress in belt direction and hand off to valid downstream receivers.
Paused simulation halts belt movement without losing buffered items.

features.title: Inserter Transfer
features.description: Support directional inserters that pick up items from one side and drop them on the opposite side for both ore and plate items.
acceptanceHints: Inserter pickup/drop sides obey current orientation.
Inserter can transfer iron-ore and iron-plate.
Transfers occur on deterministic tick-based timing.

features.title: Furnace Smelting
features.description: Implement furnace processing that converts iron-ore input into iron-plate output after a fixed tick-based processing duration.
acceptanceHints: Only iron-ore is accepted as smelt input in this slice.
Output item type is iron-plate.
No power or fuel prerequisite is required.

features.title: UI Placement Controls
features.description: Provide keyboard and mouse controls for entity selection, rotation, placement, removal, and pause toggling.
acceptanceHints: Keys 1-4 select Miner, Belt, Inserter, and Furnace respectively.
R rotates placement orientation through N/E/S/W.
Left-click places and right-click removes entities on valid target tiles.
Space pauses and resumes simulation stepping.

features.title: Run Instructions
features.description: Document local development and validation commands for Node 20+ and Vite 6 so the vertical slice can be started and checked quickly.
acceptanceHints: Instructions clearly state Node.js 20+ requirement.
Instructions clearly state Vite 6 expectations for local run/build workflows.
Includes script-based commands for install, dev run, deterministic regression checks, and strict verification.
Mentions fixed-step simulation expectations for manual validation.
